channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parking on double yellows, causing issues, 27th June
item.description:
Report to Tewkesbury Borough Council - Regular dangerous and inconciderate parking. Both on pavement, bend in road, crest of a hill and near a junction by multiple cars during the evening and night (yellow lines active during the day) I'm reporting this on behalf of the report to Tewkesbury Council. No update required. .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sussex Gardens, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 27th June
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus 15. Minutes delay boards needed Carriageway pothole. Tarmac patch required 2000x1200x40mm. Number 1 stats required (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet
